TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: b l ɪ s k ɔː l s ɛ t ɚ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ s t ɪ ŋ ɡ ə z w ɪ z h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p ʊ n ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v t ɪ k s s l ɪ p ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i ɪ s n ʌ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ aɪ z ɚ b ɑː p w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n æ k æ n d b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ h ɚ k ɪ d s ð ə s k æ n ɪ s k ɪ v ð ɪ s t ɪ ŋ ɡ z ɪ n t ə θ ɹ iː ɹ iː d b æ k s æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m ɪ ɾ ɚ w ɛ n s d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
